ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
OVERVIEW
The Skeleton Man, seething with revenge after seeing his lover Tarot fall in battle to the Swordsman to the God, plunges head first into the fight to uphold her honor. But has his rage lead him to an early grave? Has he doomed himself to be trapped in the maze forever with Tarot? The night grows dark and so does the future for the heroes!
